bioghist.p: Gilbert Bowles and Minnie Pickett Bowles were Quaker missionaries to Asia and Hawaii. Their son, Gordon T. Bowles, was a liaison officer for the Department of State and an advisor to the Educational Mission to Japan. His wife, Jane T. Bowles, helped to open the Hawaii Branch of the American Friends Service Committee.

scopecontent.p: This a collection of correspondence of Gilbert and Minnie Pickett Bowles to Gordon Bowles (1922-1932) and to Gordon and Jane Bowles (1933-1960). The frequent letters discuss both personal matters and professional activities. The collection also includes a small number of copies of letters to Herbert E. Bowles and others.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
